top.author: @1emran_hossin
top.text: Cold email isn’t broken. Your infrastructure probably is. Most people obsess over copy. The top 1% obsess over: SPF DKIM DMARC Warm-up Inbox health Because if you don’t land in the inbox, your “perfect copy” never gets read. Deliverability > Copywriting.
top.translationZh:
冷邮件没有失效，你的基础设施可能有问题。

大多数人纠结于文案内容，而顶尖的1%关注的是：
- SPF
- DKIM  
- DMARC
- 预热机制
- 邮箱健康度

因为如果邮件进不了收件箱，你的"完美文案"根本没人看到。

送达率 > 文案水平。

top.author: @1emran_hossin

top.author: @EUAIACTGUY
top.text: AI agents need permission tiers like infra: T0 READ (search/summarize) T1 WRITE (drafts only) T2 ACT (send email, open tickets, run jobs) T3 ADMIN (payments, prod changes) Default = T0. Move up only per-tool/per-task, with audit logs + rollback.
top.translationZh: AI智能体需要像基础设施一样的权限分级：T0读取（搜索/总结）T1写入（仅草稿）T2执行（发邮件、开工单、跑任务）T3管理（付款、生产变更）。默认T0级别，只能按工具/按任务逐级提升，还要有审计日志+回滚功能。

top.author: @Nir_Bashan
top.text: Technology is intoxicating. It promises to fix everything—your workflow, your inbox, maybe even your personality. But here’s the truth: it’s just a tool. A hammer. A spreadsheet. A very fancy coworker. Don’t fall in love with tech. Own it. Drive it. Let humanity lead.
top.translationZh: 科技真的很迷人，感觉什么都能解决——工作流程、邮箱管理，甚至还能改造你的性格。但事实是：它就是个工具而已。就像锤子、表格，或者一个很炫的同事。别对科技上瘾，要掌控它、驾驭它。让人性来主导一切。
